EmailTemplate.subject: Improve Your Plant’s Efficiency with Honeywell’s Drone Inspection Service

<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
"Helping you stay on time and on target during critical shutdowns"
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
We understand that you're constantly looking for ways to keep your site running safely and efficiently.
Honeywell’s UAV drone inspection service <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/uav]]> efficiently and accurately prepare you for scheduled turnarounds with ample time to order the parts and services you’ll need to stay on time and on budget during this critical time.
We've partnered with our Honeywell colleagues at UOP and UOP Callidus ® to offer on-site field inspectors and engineers for a complete inspection solution, combining our century of knowledge in aerospace safety best practices and oil and gas technology.
Our on-site UOP engineers, field technicians and drone pilot can expertly inspect flares, piping, burners and furnaces without needing to shut down your operations.
Improve your plant's operational efficiency today with Honeywell. For more information or to speak to one of our regional technical managers, please contact us below.
CONTACT US <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/UAV_Oil-and-Gas_North_America.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_uav_gh&utm_content=north+america+oil+and+gas]]>
